mapper.select: select pel.EXCHANGE_LOG_ID id, DATE_FORMAT(pel.OP_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') impDate, pp.PROVIDER_NAME providerName, pel.PROVIDER_POINT_NUM impPoint, ROUND(pp.PROVIDER_POINT_RATIO,2) rate, ROUND(pp.PROVIDER_POINT_FEE,2) fee, CAST(CONCAT(ROUND(pel.PROVIDER_POINT_NUM/pp.PROVIDER_POINT_RATIO,2),'元') AS CHAR) amount, CAST(CONCAT(ROUND((pel.PROVIDER_POINT_NUM/pp.PROVIDER_POINT_RATIO)*pp.PROVIDER_POINT_FEE /100,2),'元') AS CHAR) profit, if(pel.CHECK_STATE = 1,'已结算','未结算') exchangeState, DATE_FORMAT(pel.CHECK_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') exchangeDate, if(pel.EXP_STATE= 1,'已结算','未结算') exportState, DATE_FORMAT(pel.EXP_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %T') exportDate from pc_exchange_log pel LEFT JOIN pc_provider pp on pp.PROVIDER_ID = pel.PROVIDER_ID
